mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_buyer_coupon (COUPON_ID, BUYER_ID, CREATE_TIME, EFFECT_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME) values (#{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update rc_buyer_coupon
COUPON_ID = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUYER_ID = #{buyerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EFFECT_TIME = #{effectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where BUYER_COUPON_ID = #{buyerCouponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select BUYER_COUPON_ID, COUPON_ID, BUYER_ID, CREATE_TIME, STATUS, EFFECT_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME from rc_buyer_coupon where BUYER_COUPON_ID = #{buyerCouponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
